directions: In a food processor, combine the cilantro, mint, onion, garlic, cumin, chili, sugar, salt, lemon juice and yogurt. Puree until smooth, 2 to 3 minutes.
Transfer the chutney to a bowl, cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. The chutney keeps for up to 3 days refrigerated. Makes about 1 1/2 cups.
ingredients: 2 cups lightly packed fresh cilantro leaves
1 cup lightly packed fresh mint leaves
title: Cilantro-Mint Chutney
